universum.studios.android.setting

Class SettingHeadersAdapter.ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.setting.SettingHeadersAdapter.ViewHolder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SettingHeadersAdapter.CategoryDividerHolder, SettingHeadersAdapter.CategoryHolder, SettingHeadersAdapter.HeaderHolder
    Enclosing class:
    SettingHeadersAdapter

    public abstract static class SettingHeadersAdapter.ViewHolder
extends Object
    Base class for view holder implementations used in SettingHeadersAdapter.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BASIC_TYPE
      Constant that identifies basic type of item view associated with a specified holder.
      View itemView
      Item view associated with this holder instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewHolder(View itemView)
      Creates a new instance of ViewHolder for the given itemView.
      ViewHolder(View itemView, int itemViewType)
      Creates a new instance of ViewHolder for the given itemView that is of the specified itemViewType.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the adapter position of the item represented by this holder instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewHolder

        public ViewHolder(@NonNull
                  View itemView)
        Creates a new instance of ViewHolder for the given itemView.

        itemView - Instance of the view to be associated with new holder.

      • ViewHolder

        public ViewHolder(@NonNull
                  View itemView,
                  int itemViewType)
        Creates a new instance of ViewHolder for the given itemView that is of the specified itemViewType.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemViewType

        public final int getItemViewType()
        Returns the type of the item view associated with this holder instance.

        If this holder has been created without item view type explicitly specified then this method should return BASIC_TYPE.

        Returns:
        Type of this holder's item view.

      • getAdapterPosition

        public final int getAdapterPosition()
        Returns the adapter position of the item represented by this holder instance.
        Returns:
        Position of the item within associated adapter's data set or SettingHeadersAdapter.NO_POSITION if this holder is not bound yet or the position is unavailable at the time.
